DOC.brief_summary: Deep Venous Thrombosis affects more than 350,000 individuals each year in the U.S.The Registry will track patient outcome and quality of life over 60 months for treatment with anticoagulation and elastic compression stockings and catheter-directed thrombolysis (CDT) in accordance with current treatment guidelines .
DOC.criteria: â€¢Data obtained in line with good clinical practice, applicable laws and regulation
